CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Installation_Status__c) = "Site Survey", "Step 1", IF( TEXT(Installation_Status__c) = "Plans", "Step 2", IF( TEXT(Installation_Status__c) = "Permitting", "Step 3", IF( TEXT(Installation_Status__c) = "Glass Install", "Step 4", IF( TEXT(Installation_Status__c) = "Battery Install", "Step 5", IF( TEXT(Installation_Status__c) = "Commissioning", "Step 5P", IF( TEXT(Installation_Status__c) = "", "Step 6", "")))))))
